attributes.action: save our children in this country and throughout the world, by committing the UK to reducing carbon emissions by more than 60% by 2050.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our actions now are so important regarding climate change.  Our decisions will ultimately effect the generations to come, and I hope that our government will not  leave a legacy of starvation and conflict. We need to have the courage to set a precedent for the rest of the world to follow.  
Before you leave, Mr Blair, please take up this fight, and leave with the knowledge that history may judge you better for it.
